thread.section_title: Luxy Hair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Luxy Hair | www.luxyhair.com
thread.title: Linnea Bahlinger
thread.title_full: Luxy Hair reviewed by Linnea Bahlinger

author: Linnea Bahlinger
title: Linnea Bahlinger
text: I've been a loyal customer of luxy hair extensions for two years and they are always high quality, fast shipping, AMAZING customer service. The product quality is better than most I've seen around and it tends to arrive a bit earlier than expected, with the most polite and caring customer service team!
